mapper.select: SELECT f.SEQ, h.NAME, h.ADDRESS1, h.ADDRESS2, h.TEL, h.OPENTIME, p.PETTYPE FROM HOSPITALINFO h JOIN FAVORITE f ON h.SEQ = f.HOSPITAL_SEQ JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT(p.HOSPITAL_SEQ), LISTAGG(p.PETTYPE, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY p.PETTYPE) OVER(PARTITION BY p.HOSPITAL_SEQ) PETTYPE FROM PETTYPE p ) p ON h.SEQ = p.HOSPITAL_SEQ WHERE f.USER_EMAIL = #{email} ORDER BY f.SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAVORITE (SEQ, USER_EMAIL, HOSPITAL_SEQ) VALUES(FAVORITE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{hospital_seq})
